description: Main frontend source code for an audiobook store application, implementing a grid of audiobooks with cover images, titles, authors, and purchase buttons using Flutter.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Data model representing an audiobook with title, author, and cover image URL.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up theme and home screen.

classes.name: StoreScreen
classes.description: Main store screen displaying a grid of audiobooks.

classes.name: AudiobookGridTile
classes.description: Widget for displaying an individual audiobook's cover, title, author, and buy button.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Method overridden in each widget to describe its UI.
